# corona_percent
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/RH-sdavey/corona_percent.svg?branch=gh-pages)](https://travis-ci.com/RH-sdavey/corona_percent)

Calculates the percent of humans on the planet who are infected with Corona Virus
( I couldnt find a percentage on any website)

it takes the total number infected from https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/
and the total population from http://worldpopulationreview.com/

and does some simple maths. Every (approx.) 45 minutes.
